document_data.name: ''Bow of Awareness''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bow of awareness''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[halfling]] [[short bow]] designed to be wielded by the small folk as a [[longbow]].
document_data.Powers: A ''bow of awareness'' possessed a simple ''+1'' enchantment that improved the weapon's aim and damage output. Additionally, it ensured that the wielder was seldomly caught unawares, magically boosting their initiative in battle.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, one such bow belonged to [[Roah Moonglow]], a hin agent of the [[Zhentarim]] who did business with the recently emerged [[Cult of the Absolute]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] of [[Faerûn]].
